snp2.13:10.1: nunnameyya → na uṇṇameyya (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed) | nuṇṇameyya (bahūsu)
snp2.13:13.3: nirāso → nirāsayo (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | nirāsaso (sya-all), anāsisāno → anāsayāno (bj) | anāsasāno (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
snp2.13:19.3: Sabbasaṃyojanayogavītivatto → sabbasaṃyojaniye ca vītivatto (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
